Sources: Rwandan authorities and IMF staff estimates and projections.
Fiscal year runs from July to June.
For purposes of the PCI the overall balance (GFSM 1986 definition, incl. policy lending) is used for monitoring.

ERF-1/ ERF-2 were labelled COVID-19 spending in the 5th review. For FY24 onwards this will no longer be labeled as COVID-19 support, rather ERF-2.
